reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is incredibly knowledgeable and always willing to help. His lectures are clear and concise.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown explains concepts well, but sometimes the pace is too fast. Overall, a great professor.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: The content is difficult, and Dr. Johnson's explanations can be hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Very organized and makes the material interesting. Labs are well-structured.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is passionate about biology and makes the subject exciting. Highly recommend his classes.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and lack engagement. She knows her stuff but isn't the best at conveying it.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: A deep thinker who challenges students to question their assumptions. Can be a bit abstract.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is excellent at breaking down complex economic theories into understandable concepts.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes too biased in his views. Encourages debate, which is good.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures with real-world examples. Dr. Thomas makes the subject matter relatable.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: An amazing professor who really cares about his students' understanding and mental well-being.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Heavy reading load and hard to keep up with assignments. Lectures can be a bit monotonous.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. White brings art to life with his passion and detailed knowledge. Great at engaging students.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Her enthusiasm for the environment is contagious. Very hands-on with fieldwork opportunities.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: The content is very technical, and Dr. Lewis can be hard to understand sometimes.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is very approachable and makes anthropology fascinating with her stories and examples.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: The material is tough, and Dr. Young's teaching style doesn't make it any easier.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: A brilliant musician who inspires her students. Classes are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. Scott's passion for the stars is evident. Lectures are interesting, though sometimes a bit dense.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Linguistics is a tough subject, and Dr. Green's explanations are sometimes unclear. But she's helpful during office hours.
